References

INSPIRE_SU

INSPIRE Data Specification on Statistical Units - Draft Technical Guidelines. Version D2.8.III.1_v3.0RC3. URL: http://inspire.jrc.ec.europa.eu/documents/Data_Specifications/INSPIRE_DataSpecification_SU_v3.0rc3.pdf

INSPIRE_GCM

INSPIRE Generic Conceptual Model. Version D2.5_v3.4rc3. URL: http://inspire.jrc.ec.europa.eu/documents/Data_Specifications/D2.5_v3.4rc3.pdf

McGK10

McCallister, E.; Grance, T.; Kent, K. (2010). Guide to protecting the confidentiality of personally identifiable information (PII). Recommendations of the National Institute of Standards and Technology, National Institute of Standards and Technology. Special Publication 800-122. URL: http://csrc.nist.gov/publications/nistpubs/800-122/sp800-122.pdf

ElIV07

Elmagarmid, A. K.; Ipeirotis, P. G.; Verykios, V. S. (2007). Duplicate record detection: A survey. Knowledge and Data Engineering, IEEE Transactions on, 19(1):1-16. URL: http://archive.nyu.edu/bitstream/2451/14760/5/tkde2007.pdf

SaBM99

Sandhu, Ravi; Bhamidipati, Venkata; Munawer, Qamar (1999). The ARBAC97 model for role-based administration of roles. ACM Transactions on Information and System Security (TISSEC) 2.1 :105-135. URL: http://www.lcs.syr.edu/faculty/chin/cse774/readings/rbac/arbac97.pdf

SaFK00

Sandhu, Ravi; Ferraiolo, David; Kuhn, Richard (2000). The NIST Model for Role-Based Access Control: Towards A Unified Standard. in Proceedings of the fifth ACM workshop on Role-based access control.:47-63

BaMY02

Bacon, Jean; Moody, Ken; Yao, Walt (2002). A model of OASIS role-based access control and its support for active security. ACM Transactions on Information and System Security (TISSEC) 5.4 :492-540. URL: http://users.cis.fiu.edu/~lyang03/Li/CEN4105/rbac-active-oasis02.pdf

Dodg03

Dodge, Yadolah (Ed.). (2003). The Oxford dictionary of statistical terms. Oxford University Press. 512pp.

Eurostat02

Eurostat (2002). “Assessment of Quality in Statistics: Glossary”, Working Group, Luxembourg, May 2002

Eurostat03

Eurostat (2003). “Assessment of Quality in Statistics: Glossary”, Working Group, Luxembourg, October 2003. URL: http://unstats.un.org/unsd/dnss/docs-nqaf/Eurostat-GLOSSARY_1.pdf

GESMES_UserGuide

European Central Bank (ECB), Bank for International Settlement (BIS), Eurostat, International Monetary Fund (IMF), Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD). “GESMES/TS User Guide”, Release 3.00, February, 2003; unpublished on paper

IMF_DQAF

International Monetary Fund, “Data Quality Assessment Framework - DQAF - Glossary”, unpublished

ISO_IEC_11179-1

ISO/IEC 11179-1:2004, Information Technology – Metadata registries (MDR) – Part 1: Framework. URL: http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c035343_ISO_IEC_11179-1_2004(E).zip URL: http://metadata-standards.org/11179/

ISO/IEC 11179-2:2004, Information Technology – Metadata registries (MDR) – Part 2: Classification. URL: http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c035345_ISO_IEC_11179-2_2005(E).zip URL: http://metadata-standards.org/11179/

ISO_IEC_11179-3

ISO/IEC 11179-2:2013, Information Technology – Metadata registries (MDR) – Part 3: Registry metamodel and basic attributes. URL: http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c050340_ISO_IEC_11179-3_2013.zip URL: http://metadata-standards.org/11179/

ISO_IEC_11179-4

ISO/IEC 11179-2:2004, Information Technology – Metadata registries (MDR) – Part 4: Formulation of data definition. URL: http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c035346_ISO_IEC_11179-4_2004(E).zip URL: http://metadata-standards.org/11179/

ISO_IEC_11179-5

ISO/IEC 11179-2:2005, Information Technology – Metadata registries (MDR) – Part 5: Naming and identification principles. URL: http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c035347_ISO_IEC_11179-5_2005(E).zip URL: http://metadata-standards.org/11179/

ISO_IEC_11179-6

ISO/IEC 11179-2:2005, Information Technology – Metadata registries (MDR) – Part 6: Registration. URL: http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/c035348_ISO_IEC_11179-6_2005(E).zip URL: http://metadata-standards.org/11179/

Kish65

Kish, L., (1965). Survey Sampling

Mait02

Maitland-Smith, F. (2002). Use of Benchmark Data to Align or Derive Quarterly/Monthly Estimates. Paper presented at the June 2002 meeting of the OECD Short-term Economic Statistics Working Party, Paris

Marriott, F.H.C. (1990). A Dictionary of Statistical Terms. 5th edition. Longman Scientific & Technical , New York.

Neuc02

Neuchâtel Group (2002). Neuchâtel Terminology: Classification database object types and their attributes - Version 2. September 2002

OECD02

OECD (2002). Quality Framework for OECD Statistics. Paris, June 2002. URL: http://www.oecd.org/document/43/0,2340,en_2649_34257_21571947_119820_1_1_1,00.htm

Statistics Canada (2003). Statistics Canada Quality Guidelines. 4th edition, October 2003. URL: http://www.statcan.ca/english/freepub/12-539-XIE/12-539-XIE03001.pdf

Statistics Canada (2009). Statistics Canada Quality Guidelines. 5th edition, October 2009. URL: http://www.statcan.gc.ca/pub/12-539-x/12-539-x2009001-eng.pdf

StCa98

Statistics Canada (1998). Statistics Canada Quality Guidelines. 3th edition, October 1998.

UNDESA00

United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs (2000). Handbook on Geographic Information Systems and Digital Mapping. Studies in Methods, Series F, No. 79, Annex VI - Glossary, New York.

UNECE00a

Economic Commission for Europe of the United Nations (2000). Terminology on Statistical Metadata. Conference of European Statisticians Statistical Standards and Studies, No. 53, Geneva.

UNECE00b

Economic Commission for Europe of the United Nations (2000). Glossary of Terms on Statistical Data Editing. Conference of European Statisticians Methodological material, Geneva, 2000. URL: http://www.unece.org/stats/publications/editingglossary.pdf

UNECE95

United Nations Statistical Commission and Economic Commission for Europe of the United Nations (1995). Guidelines for the Modeling of Statistical Data and Metadata, Conference of European Statisticians, Methodological material, United Nations, Geneva. URL: http://www.unece.org/stats/publications/metadatamodeling.pdf

UNGCT

Expert Group on International Economic and Social Classifications (sd). United Nations Glossary of Classification Terms. URL: http://unstats.un.org/unsd/class/family/glossary_short.asp

UNSO84

Statistical Office of the United Nations (1984). Handbook of Household Surveys, Revised Edition. Studies in Methods, Series F, No. 31, United Nations, New York.

USBC98

United States Bureau of the Census (1998). Survey Design and Statistical Methodology Metadata. United States Bureau of the Census, Software and Standards Management Branch, Systems Support Division,, Washington D.C., August 1998. URL: http://www.census.gov/srd/www/metadata/metada18.pdf
